reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater's fabric soft and appreciate its cute design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is what is described in the photo which is not always true.
items.body: Great sweater! Really soft Read more
items.author: AS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Prickly fabric
items.body: Sweater is oversized. I purchased brown, its more heathered brown and maroon. Design is pretty, but I absolutely could not stand skin contact with it. Fabric is very prickly and I just had sensory overload. Read more
items.author: Yelena D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!
items.body: This sweater is just as advertised. Cute! Read more
items.author: Maureen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Cute but even the small is really big. It’s soft to the touch but irritating when on. I love the floral detail and wanted it to fit but just didn’t. I’m 5’2, 120 lbs. Read more
items.author: Jessica M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: I love love this sweater! It looks and feels like an expensive name brand. It is soft and fits nicely, not fitted at all but standard fit without feeling boxy. Shorter length but not cropped. It's warm and comfortable. I can see how someone who is a bit sensitive might find it a little bit itchy at first but it's fine on me, I got used to it quickly. There's only one weird thing- the placement of the flower and the raised center of the flower hit exactly at the center of the right breast. I can imagine that on someone who is large chested this would be a bit awkward, I kinda pull it down a bit and I think I can get away with it, but I wish the flower was placed a bit differently so that it didn't hit it the exact spot. Read more
items.author: yb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty- check the size
items.body: It’s very pretty- runs bit big I did wash it, inside out with Woolite on delicate w/ softer - 10 low dyer Looks great Read more
items.author: Christine Allen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The material has nice weight to it and the quality is really good.
items.body: I love this sweater. It is very soft and comfortable. The arms have good length and are comfortably slouchy. It looks cute by itself or with a collard shirt under it. I like the minimal design of the flower on it and the color is great. The body of the sweater is perfect length and is very flattering. The only thing that I don't like about this sweater is that it needs to be handwashed. The material has a nice weight to it and the quality is really good. Read more
items.author: Misha Foreman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy!
items.body: This sweater is so incredibly soft! I was trying on all my new fall sweaters and the difference in this sweater's texture compared to the other was very noticeable. It is fuzzy, but not at all scratchy. It fit to size, comfortable and cozy without being frumpy. I love the subtle flower that is the same color as the sweater. It gives the sweater some dimension and flare, but still working as causal wear for the office. The stitched cords of the flower feel very secure and didn't fray of fall when washed in the delicate cycle. Read more
items.author: Tim

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Dark Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
